legal separation amend rsa by inserting after paragraph ix the following new paragraphs a the provisions of rsa and as amended or inserted by shall not apply to modifications of orders in cases whose initial petition for divorce or legal separation was filed prior to january unless the court finds that the original order a was based on an agreement of the parties adopting some or all of the provisions of that act or b specified that the court was adopting some or all of the provisions of that act absent such a finding modifications of these orders shall be controlled by the law in effect on the date the initial petition for divorce or legal separation was filed b parties to any case in which the initial petition was filed prior to january may agree to adopt some or all of the be modified in accordance with rsa ii without the need to demonstrate the findings in rsa vi provided that a the alimony order was issued pursuant to rsa and as amended or inserted by b the alimony
